includedAssets.title: She Knows
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike tries to close a big case, while Harvey searches for a way to avoid firing him after Jessica reveals she knows the truth.

includedAssets.synopsis: Jessica turns to Harvey for help as she tries to find supporters and protect her position from Hardman. Rachel confronts Mike.
